sentences.en: A grey mackintosh was folded over her arm.
sentences.cn: 她胳膊上搭着一件灰色雨衣。

sentences.en: After reworking the musical, Mackintosh and the directors got the cast together in April 1985.
sentences.cn: 修改音乐剧之后, 麦肯塔区和导演在一九八五年四月集合所有演员.

sentences.en: Alexander took off his black mackintosh.
sentences.cn: 亚历山大脱下黑色的雨衣.

sentences.en: At IASB, meanwhile , Ian Mackintosh is whispered to have the inside track to replace Sir David.
sentences.cn: 与此同时,在IASB, 小道消息称伊恩·麦金托什被内定为大卫爵士的接班人.

sentences.en: Bring down my mackintosh and traveling - cloak, and some stout shoes, though we shall do little walking.
sentences.cn: 去把我的雨衣和风衣拿来, 还有几双结实点的鞋, 尽管我们会比较少走路.

sentences.en: Bring down my mackintosh and travelling - cloak, and some stout shoes, though we shall do little walking.
sentences.cn: 你去把我的雨衣和旅行毯拿来, 你应该带一双结实的鞋子,其实, 我们步行的时候很少,也许根本用不着步行.

sentences.en: Mackintosh of Mackintosh after using the cleaning surface contains paper powder, ink, etc.
sentences.cn: 橡皮布的冲洗橡皮布搁置后暗地含有纸粉 、 油不朱等精神.

sentences.en: Perhaps that's what Cameron Mackintosh saw . Why he asked me in . The French connection.
sentences.cn: 可能卡梅隆·麦金托什就是看中了这一点,跟法国人的联系,所以他请我加入.

sentences.en: Sorrow and trouble either soften the heart or harden it. ( James Mackintosh, British writer )
sentences.cn: 悲哀和烦恼不是使人心软,就是使人心狠. ( 英国作家麦金托什 )

sentences.en: Thank you for your lending me your mackintosh.
The slimy pavement looked like a wet mackintosh.
sentences.cn: 粘搭搭的人行道看来象一件湿雨衣.

sentences.en: The winners are as follows: E. Walker; R. Foster; R. Gates; A. Mackintosh.
sentences.cn: 优胜者分别是：E.沃克、R.福斯特、R.盖茨和A.麦金托什。
你的雨衣系上带子更好看.

trans.tran_cn: 雨衣，防水斗篷，防水胶布
trans.tran_en: a coat which you wear to keep out the rain
